dcterms:description: The state space in the Arita game is abstracted from the images in the last three frames, resized to 84 × 84, and involves two coordinate systems to describe the interaction environment and visualize the state space.
dcterms:title: Arita game

dcterms:creator: Xu et al.
dcterms:description: The dataset used in Xu et al. (2020) is referenced for its methodology in deep reinforcement learning for multi-exit evacuation simulations.
dcterms:title: Dataset used in Xu et al. (2020)

dcterms:creator: Zheni et al.
dcterms:description: The dataset mentioned in Zheni et al. (2009) is referenced in the context of GIS problems involving space and pedestrian movement.
dcterms:title: Dataset mentioned in Zheni et al. (2009)

dcterms:creator: Xu and Güting
dcterms:description: The dataset mentioned in Xu and Güting (2013) is referenced in relation to traditional methods in multi-exit evacuation simulations.
dcterms:title: Dataset mentioned in Xu and Güting (2013)

dcterms:creator: Tryfona et al.
dcterms:description: The dataset mentioned in Tryfona et al. (2003) is referenced in the context of pedestrian simulations and evacuation strategies.
dcterms:title: Dataset mentioned in Tryfona et al. (2003)
